sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Box, Flex, Link, Menu, MenuButton, MenuList, MenuItem, useMediaQuery, IconButton, Drawer, DrawerOverlay, DrawerContent, DrawerCloseButton, DrawerHeader, DrawerBody, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { HamburgerIcon, CloseIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"; const Navbar = () => { const [isLargerThan768] = useMediaQuery("(min-width: 768px)"); const [showDrawer, setShowDrawer] = useState(false); const toggleDrawer = () => { setShowDrawer(!showDrawer); }; return ( <> {isLargerThan768 ? ( Home About Services More Contact FAQ ) : ( } onClick={toggleDrawer} bg="#F5F5F5" color="black" /> )} {/* Drawer Component for Mobile View */} Home About Services Contact FAQ ); }; export default Navbar;
